item.title: To the Friends and Investigators of the Church
item.description:
To the Friends and Investigators of the Church by Elder Joaquin E. Costa, Of the Seventy given in Session 6 of 187th Annual General Conference on Fri Mar 31 2017
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Elder Joaquin E. Costa, Of the Seventy

item.title: The Power of Jesus Christ in Our Lives Every Day
item.description:
The Power of Jesus Christ in Our Lives Every Day by Elder Joaquin E. Costa, Of the Seventy given in Saturday Afternoon of 193rd Semiannual General Conference on Sat Sep 30 2023
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
